subtitle: An all-in-one meal for breakfast, lunch or any time of day.

method.text: Place the fish and mace in a frying pan. Cover with milk. Bring to the boil then simmer for about 15 min until fish is just cooked. Remove fish from the milk. Leave to drain and cool slightly.
Flake the fish, discarding the bones. Keep warm.
Tip the rice into the milk and cook for about 8-10 min until just cooked.
Meanwhile, fry the onion in the butter for 2-3 min until softened. Add the curry powder. Cook for 1 min.
Drain rice well. Carefully toss the fish, rice, onion mixture, prawns and parsley together before spooning into a warmed serving dish. Arrange eggs on top.

title: Smoky kedgeree
